title: RNA-seq gene type quantification quality metric
description: Schema for reporting number of reads per gene category in RNA-seq. https://www.gencodegenes.org/pages/biotypes.html

Mt_rRNA.title: Number of reads in mitochondrial rRNA

antisense.title: Number of reads in antisense RNA
antisense.description: Number of reads in transcripts that overlap the genomic span (i.e. exon or introns) of a protein-coding locus on the opposite strand.

processed_transcript.title: Number of reads in processed transcript
processed_transcript.description: Number of reads mapped to genomic regions which don't contain an ORF.

protein_coding.title: Number of reads in protein coding gene

ribozyme.title: Number of reads in ribozyme gene

sRNA.title: Number of reads in small RNA

scaRNA.title: Number of reads in small Cajal body-specific RNAs (scaRNAs)

sense_intronic.title: Number of reads in intronic transcript
sense_intronic.description: Number of reads in long non-coding transcript in introns of a coding gene that does not overlap any exons.

sense_overlapping.title: Number of reads in gene containing intronic gene
sense_overlapping.description: Number of reads in long non-coding transcript that contains a coding gene in its intron on the same strand.

snRNA.title: Number of reads in small nuclear RNA

snoRNA.title: Number of reads in small nucleolar RNA

spikein.title: Number of reads mapped to RNA spike-in
